code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import all_knives from'../Components/Assets/all_knifes';import'./CSS/searchedknives.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchedKnives=()=>{const[filteredKnives,setFilteredKnives]=useState([]);const location=useLocation();const searchParams=new URLSearchParams(location.search);const query=searchParams.get('query');useEffect(()=>{if(query){const filtered=all_knives.filter(knife=>knife.name.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()));setFilteredKnives(filtered);}},[query]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"searched-knives",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Search Results for: ",query]}),filteredKnives.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"knife-grid",children:filteredKnives.map(knife=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"knife-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:knife.image,alt:knife.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:knife.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: $",knife.knife_price.toFixed(2)]})]},knife.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No results found."})]});};export default SearchedKnives;
